snippet.title: [Download v1.2] Star Revenge 5.5 - Destroyed Memories - Release
snippet.description:
If you thought to yourself that SR5 was too easy, well now you got this. SR5.5 is like SR5 70 stars long, it uses level from SR5 for the most part, but remixes thier theme and feel to make them into new level, while also having some copleatly original levels aswell - if you know how SR6.5 and SR7.5 are, then you know what this hack is.
Like mentioned, this hack is more on the hard end of things. Also unlike most hacks, in this one you are only allowed to save stars via the "cap" switches in the overworld until you get at least 40 stars, from then you can save when you want, just to add a lil live management... you get 25 lifes, don't worry.

Download v1.2: https://romhacking.com/hack/star-revenge-55-destroyed-memories

Music: Play a Mini-Game (Deluxe mix) - by SM64Pie
